Class Board

java.lang.Object
ai.boardgame.Board
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
The Class Board. This is a connect 4 board

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board​(Vector2 topLeft, int rows, int columns)
      Instantiates a new board().
      Parameters:
      topLeft - - the position of the topleft corner of the board
      rows - - how many rows the board has
      columns - - how many columns the board has

  • Method Details

    • setFirstMoves

      public void setFirstMoves()
      Sets the first moves. The first moves is all the moves on the bottom of the board

    • currentPlayer

      public GamePiece currentPlayer()
      get Current Player
      Returns:
      GamePiece - which is the color of the player white:player black:computer

    • getMoves

      public java.util.ArrayList<Move> getMoves()
      Gets the variable "Moves".
      Returns:
      move[] - Moves

    • makeMove

      public Board makeMove​(Move move)
      Make move.
      Parameters:
      move - the move
      Returns:
      board

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      Checks if is game over.
      Returns:
      true, if is game over

    • evaluate

      public float evaluate​(GamePiece player)
      Method that returns a score based on the current position of all pieces on the board if player is winning return 10, if opposite player is winning return -10. If tied return 1 and return 0 if nothing
      Parameters:
      player - - player checking the current evaluation
      Returns:
      float - the score

    • render

      public void render​(java.awt.Graphics2D g, java.awt.image.ImageObserver observer, float x, float y)
      Method that renders the moves, and the bounding boxes. This is used for visual testing
      Parameters:
      g - - graphics
      observer - - window observer
      x - - x offset from camera
      y - - y offset from camera

    • renderWinPieces

      public void renderWinPieces​(java.awt.Graphics2D g, java.awt.image.ImageObserver observer)
      Render win pieces. This method renders a line over the winning pieces
      Parameters:
      g - the g
      observer - the observer

    • columnFull

      public boolean columnFull​(Vector2 position)
      Column full. This method checks if the current column is full so that no new pieces can continue falling on full columns
      Parameters:
      position - the position
      Returns:
      true, if successful

    • addPieceToGrid

      public void addPieceToGrid​(Move move)
      Adds the piece to grid. This method adds the fallen pieces to the grid and add a new move above the new piece.
      Parameters:
      move - the move

    • makeClone

      public Board makeClone()
      Make clone. This method creates a new board clone of the current board.
      Returns:
      board

    • isTied

      public boolean isTied()
      Checks if is tied. If any grid locations still contain -1 the game is not a tie
      Returns:
      true, if is tied

    • won

      public int won()
      Checks if is game over.
      Returns:
      true, if is game over

    • getPoints

      public int getPoints()
      Checks if is game over.
      Returns:
      true, if is game over

    • getPosition

      public Vector2 getPosition​(int column, int row)
      Gets the variable "Position".
      Parameters:
      column - the column
      row - the row
      Returns:
      vector 2 - Position
